actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to establish the Office of Law Enforcement in the United States Fish and Wildlife Service.
short_title: United States Fish and Wildlife Service Law Enforcement Clarification and Enhancement Act

summary.text: United States Fish and Wildlife Service Law Enforcement Clarification and Enhancement Act - Amends the Fish and Wildlife Act of 1956 to establish the Division of Law Enforcement in the Office of the Director of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service.

titles.title: United States Fish and Wildlife Service Law Enforcement Clarification and Enhancement Act
A bill to establish the Office of Law Enforcement in the United States Fish and Wildlife Service.
